channel.title: Lecture Notes on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Lecture Notes on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: lec09_parts.zip
item.description: This resource is a supporting file for CAD parts.

item.title: Lecture Notes
item.description: Lecture slides are available for most sessions. Some contain additional notes by the professor inserted after the class was taught. SES # TOPICS NOTES 1 Course introduction, contest overview (PDF 1 - 1.5MB) (PDF 2) (Courtesy of MIT Electric Vehicle Team. Used with permission.) (PDF 3) (Courtesy of Justin Negrete. Used with permission.) 2 Problem definition and design (PDF - 4.6MB) 3 Actuators – DC motors, servomotors, pneumatics (PDF) 4 Creating CAD components 1 (PDF - 1.

item.title: MIT2_007s09_lec01_EVT.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information about potential 2.007-EVT projects are important for both vehicles and outreach and hands-on demonstration.

item.title: SW2007
item.description: CAD Parts (to assemble) provided in support of a lecture on creating CAD assemblies. This ZIP file contains: 5 .sldprt files and 1 .sldasm file
